description: This file defines API routes related to ticket management in a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting tickets, as well as listing and creating comments associated with tickets.

methods.name: list_tickets( status: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional status filter"), q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional search query to match in title or description"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number (1-based)"), size: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Page size"), repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo), )
methods.description: Retrieve a list of tickets with optional filtering by status and search query, with pagination.

methods.name: get_ticket(ticket_id: int, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo))
methods.description: Retrieve a specific ticket by its ID.

methods.name: create_ticket(payload: TicketCreate, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo))
methods.description: Create a new ticket with provided data.

methods.name: update_ticket(ticket_id: int, payload: TicketUpdate, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo))
methods.description: Update an existing ticket identified by its ID.

methods.name: delete_ticket(ticket_id: int, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo))
methods.description: Delete a ticket by its ID.

methods.name: list_comments(ticket_id: int, repo: CommentRepository = Depends(get_comment_repo))
methods.description: List all comments associated with a specific ticket.

methods.name: create_comment(ticket_id: int, payload: CommentCreate, repo: CommentRepository = Depends(get_comment_repo))
methods.description: Create a new comment on a specific ticket, ensuring path and payload ticket IDs match.

ctags.name: create_comment
ctags.pattern: /^def create_comment(ticket_id: int, payload: CommentCreate, repo: CommentRepository = Depends(get/
ctags.signature: (ticket_id: int, payload: CommentCreate, repo: CommentRepository = Depends(get_comment_repo))

ctags.name: list_tickets
ctags.signature: ( status: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional status filter"), q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional search query to match in title or description"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number (1-based)"), size: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Page size"), repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo), )

ctags.name: update_ticket
ctags.pattern: /^def update_ticket(ticket_id: int, payload: TicketUpdate, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ti/
ctags.signature: (ticket_id: int, payload: TicketUpdate, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo))
